note: I have extensive international experience working in multilateral organizations, government, and the private sector. I have worked on stakeholder engagement, partnership-building and as an advisor to facilitate the achievement of public or company goals. I have extensively worked on the design and implementation of public policy. My expertise includes ESG as a critical business issue: sustainability, human capital, corporate social responsibility and human rights.

fields.name: Member of the Board of Trustees of the IFRS
Senior Advisor to the Administrator on Policy and Strategy
Resident Fellow - Institute of Politics Havard University 2019
